name: IsabellaLexSupport
_source: speak;Isabella;Some arrows I found. Took them right out of that monster we took down!
speak;Lex;Ah, I see. I don't typically reuse my arrows, but thank you.
speak;Lex;I like to think of it as a way to give back to those who come after me. If a traveler is struggling, some arrows may be able to save them.
speak;Isabella;Oh, I see! It's like a gift.
speak;Lex;Exactly. If they need them to hunt dinner, or to get out of a bandit attack, I'd like to give them that hope.
speak;Isabella;That's really nice, Lex! I should start doing that with my javelins!
speak;Lex;Woah, uh{tgm}...{tgm} maybe not. Javelins are a lot more expensive than arrows, after all.
speak;Lex;Once we get out of here, I can teach you some other ways I like to give back, okay?
